items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals higher open for India, after Fed's 50bps rate cut
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: The Indian stock markets were expected to open higher on Thursday, following the US Federal Reserve's decision to cut policy rates by a widely expected 50bps.

items.title: Nifty Auto, Energy bearish on charts; check key levels and trading strategy
items.description: The Nifty Energy Index is showing a bearish trend in the near term, as indicated by multiple technical indicators such as RSI, MACD, and Stochastic, which all suggest further downside movement.

items.title: Nifty to gain upside momentum above 25,500; MphasiS, OFSS see short buildup
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 19: Options data hint that short term support for Nifty is at 25,250; while upside momentum is expected above 25,500, says Sahaj Agarwal of Kotak Securities.

items.title: Why did Mphasis, Nifty IT gain up to 4% after US Fed cut rates by 50 bps?
items.description: The surge in IT stocks was fuelled by the US Federal Reserve's decision to cut interest rates by 50 basis points, lowering the target range to 4.75 per cent to 5 per cent.

items.title: SpiceJet shares fly high after Rs 3000 crore QIP oversubscribed
items.description: SpiceJet's Rs 3,000 crore qualified institutional placement has been oversubscribed

items.title: Bharti Airtel becomes 4th listed company to cross Rs 10 trillion market cap
items.description: The combined market cap of Bharti Airtel (Rs 9.52 trillion) and Bharti Airtel's partly paid shares (Rs 49,526 crore) touched Rs 10.02 trillion in intra-day trade on Thursday.

items.title: Will the BSE Sensex hit 90,000-mark by Dec 2024? Here's what chart says
items.description: The Sensex hit a new high at 83,774 in intra-day deals on Thursday; and has rallied 6% this quarter. Can the BSE benchmark rally another 7.4% to hit the 90K mark by year-end? Check key levels here.

items.title: NTPC hits all-time high after arm files draft papers for Rs 10,000-cr IPO
items.description: The surge in the NTPC share price came after the company filed Initial Public Offering (IPO) papers for its green energy arm, NTPC Green Energy Limited (NGEL).

items.title: Ion Exchange share price flies 10% on Rs 161-cr order win; details here
items.description: The uptick in Ion Exchange share price came after the company announced that it has secured an order worth Rs 161.19 crore from Adani Power.

items.title: Crude Oil Strategy Today: Check target price, support & other key levels
